<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs=""
>
[Sniper's Bead](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1234)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 186</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a two-handed firearm or crossbow

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt a ranged Strike with the affixed weapon before rolling

**Requirement** You're a master with the affixed weapon.
</row>

</column>

---

This plain wooden bead dangles from a string attached to the stock of the affixed weapon. When you activate the bead, its magic greatly lessens the effect of distance on your triggering attack.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sniper's Bead
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 186</row>

**Price** 16 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You take no [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) penalty on your attack, as long as the attack is against a target within the affixed weapon's first two range increments.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sniper's Bead (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 186</row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You take no range increment penalty on your attack, as long as the attack is against a target within the affixed weapon's first four range increments.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sniper's Bead (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 186</row>

**Price** 1,600 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You take no range increment penalty on your attack, even if the target is all the way out to the weapon's sixth range increment. As normal, you still can't hit a target more than six range increments away.
name: Sniper's Bead
